Anyone yet find out if this is PAL or NTSC - sort of important info for those of us running this in the USA on actual PSOnes.

It's NTSC, which is what I needed - thanks. It works in pSX emulator (http://psxemulator.gazaxian.com/) and on my real PSOne. Wtf is up with mdf? Do we need ANOTHER format? I converted to bin/cue with mdf2iso (Linux), but it wrote the cue file wrong. It had mode1 instead of mode2, in case anyone else tries this (cue file is just a text file and easy to edit).
